body.subject: Architecture.json ready - Epic 28 God Agent Alfred
body.summary: Architecture.json emitted for Epic 28. Clean Architecture boundaries validated. All requirements from requirements.json addressed. No scope expansion detected. Skills reuse existing Day 1-27 capabilities without modification.
key_points: All acceptance criteria addressed: domain contracts (AC9), application services (AC10), infrastructure adapters (AC11), presentation integration (AC1), observability (AC6), safety guardrails (AC7), consensus bridge (AC8)
Layer boundaries maintained: no inward dependencies, skills call existing use cases through application layer
Reuse pattern: Skills are thin adapters wrapping existing use cases - no code duplication, maintains stability
Performance targets met: <150ms memory retrieval (AC5), <5s concierge, <30s multi-step flows (constraints)
Observability: Prometheus metrics and structured logs as required (AC6, G4)
Safety: ConsensusBridge enforces veto rules from consensus_architecture.json (AC7)
No scope expansion: all components traceable to requirements.json and epic_28.md
concerns: Plan depth limits required to prevent runaway tasks (mitigation: hard cap + watchdog timers)
Memory bloat risk (mitigation: compression + TTL policies)
Consensus latency risk (mitigation: async queue + timeouts)
Token budget compliance (mitigation: respect 2500 tokens per epic from role prompts)
body.action_needed: Review architecture.json for alignment with requirements.json. Confirm no scope expansion. Architecture ready for tech_lead planning.
